document_data.name: Summon Undead I
document_data.mainbody: '''''Summon undead I''''', also known as '''''undead summoning I''''', was the weakest of the series of ''[[summon undead]]'' spells available to arcane casters in the [[Forgotten Realms|Realms]].
document_data.Effects: This spell could summon a medium-sized [[skeleton]] or small [[zombie]]. Usually, the skeleton of a [[human]] [[warrior]] or a [[kobold]] zombie were chosen.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required a [[material component]], a piece of bone from either a [[ghast]], [[ghoul]] or [[wight]].
document_data.History: This spell was known to be used by wizards of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
